thumb.title: Snowboarding in Tarvisio
thumb.description: Some nice freeriding in the piste of the Tarvisio ski resort. Unfortunately all the lower tracks were closed due to the lack of snow (you could really feel the thaw snow in the video), but had a great time up on the tops despite these conditions. 0:00 Intro0:23 Florianca (11) 4:37 Foresta (12) 7:31 Malga (13) 11:06 End Tarvisio, Italy 2024
